item.title: The goal of the Digestive Health Malaysia Society is to increase awareness of the importance of maintaining a healthy gut
item.description:
The Malaysian Ministry of Health’s 2014 Health Facts report reveals that digestive diseases are the fifth leading cause of hospital deaths in Malaysia, prompting the establishment of the Digestive Health Malaysia Society. Dato’ Dr Muhammad Radzi, Chairman of the Digestive Health Malaysia Society, highlighted that while colon cancer is widely recognized, awareness of other digestive diseases like irritable bowel syndrome, diverticulitis, gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), and Crohn’s disease remains low. These conditions are often chronic and challenging to diagnose and manage...
